name: Orchestral Quest
description:
Game create for Mix and Game Jam (2020) -  RPG x Rhythm game

Hi ! This game is really short and probably quite buggy. I hope you enjoy it anyway!

The genres I mixed up are: rhythm games and Turn-based combat. You will fight your opponents using your instruments and your breath. !

The games that inspired me : Etrian Odyssey and Zelda.

Controls

- - Keyboard arrows to select and play music - -

- - Space to validate - -

PS : Sorry the full screen mode of the web version does not work correctly (you will not see the whole screen, and also void)
